channel.title: [pi] help!
channel.description:
So I start downloading my cache via my auto cache downloader and it downloads fine at like 1000KB/s. When I delete it later and test the auto cache downloader again, here's what happens about 15 mins after I start downloading it.
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/cacheoqo.png[/img]
The cache is about 95MB, but the first time, it was really fast, so the cause is probably not the size of it. The first time, it downloaded at 1000KB/s, then, the second time, it downloaded at 28KB/s.
